import React, {useContext, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { StyledSideBar } from '../Style/StyledSideBar' import Button from './Button' import {UserContext} from '../contexts/UserContext' import FetchKit from '../data/fetchKit' export default function SideBar() { const {userObj, setUserObj, isToken} = useContext(UserContext) useEffect(() => { if(localStorage.getItem("USERTOKEN")){ FetchKit.userDetailFetch() .then(res => res.json()) .then(objData => { setUserObj(objData) console.log(objData) }) } }, []) return (
